name: Time Raider
description:
=============================================

Welcome to the tomb.

You have been imprisoned by the evil wizard Jack-In-A-Pot.

Fight your way through the monstrous minions of this malicious mage’s malcontent.

Discover mysterious hidden secrets to become powerful enough to escape the curse that keeps you bound.

Can you make it out in time?

=============================================

Made For Ludum Dare 47

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/time-raider

=============================================
